text: Tallahala Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==Names== Tallahala is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "standing rocks". According to the Geographic Names Information System, Tallahala Creek has also been known as: *East Tallahala Creek *Fiume Tale Houma *Hashlupbacher Creek *Hashlupbatcher Creek *Hashluphatcher Creek *Hooma Creek *Talahala Creek *Talahola Creek *Talla Creek *Talla Halla Creek *Tallahala River *Tallahalah Creek *Tallahalie Creek *Tallahalla Creek *Tallahalla River *Tallahoma Creek *Tallahuta Creek *Tallee Hooma River *Tallyhomo River *West Fork Tallahala Creek ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Jasper County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Jones County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Perry County, Mississippi
title: Tallahala Creek
